meanings.definition: A South American plant of the sunflower family, with sweet leaves.
meanings.sent1: The stevia plant grows in South America.
meanings.sent2: I added stevia leaves to my tea for sweetness.
meanings.sent3: The stevia plant whispered sweet secrets to the sunflowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a stevia leaf.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of stevia filled the garden with a sugary scent.

meanings.definition: A sweet-tasting substance obtained from the leaves of the stevia plant, used as a sugar substitute.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using stevia instead of sugar in my coffee.
meanings.sent2: The stevia extract made the dessert deliciously sweet.
meanings.sent3: The stevia packet danced happily in the sugar bowl.
meanings.sent4: His words were as sweet as stevia on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The stevia powder sprinkled on the cake like magic sweetness.
